message.body: I know u are a lil upset with the Flyers these days but would u like to go to the season opener on Thurs? I got tix!
Sure, but only if you let me return the favor with a game in December. :)
Also do you want to try to walk tomorrow?

Sounds great! I've never been to a season opener but I'm told if we show our tix we also get access to the Cadillac Grille. Not sure what this is but I guess we can check it out if we want. If into or if it is a bust my plan is to get a sausage and pepper sandwich. I can almost taste this already!
I could walk tomorrow but it would have to be around 6 if that works.
Sounds great. Want to head down a little bit early on Thursday then? And I can do 6 tomorrow
Sounds great. Want to head down a little bit early on Thursday then? And I can do 6 tomorrow
Prob a good idea to go down a bit early. Game starts at 7. What time do u think we should leave?
Maybe try to leave by 5:15? Is that doable?

According to website Cadillac Grille opens two hours b4 game but looks a little fancy to me. We could check it out for a drink before the game but I still see a sausage and pepper sandwich in my future.
Yes, 5:15 should work! I will plan accordingly!
